name: Armor of Wonder
effect:
:instant: Draw 1 card and gain +1 :attack:.

— OR —

:instant: Draw 1 card and gain +1 :defense:.
flavor_text: A gang of Rogues is sifting through the possessions of some dead warriors. Scaring off the scavengers, you notice the Rogues had overlooked a dirty, but serviceable, breastplate.
